category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 6 (Term of office)
contents: Article 6 (Term of Office) ① The term of office of members shall be two years, but they may be reappointed. Revised 2019. 1.31., 2023. 7. 5. ② The term of office of a member is not based on the number of days but is based on the regular general meeting of the Sports Council, and in this case, the expiration date of the term is the day before the regular general meeting. Revised on July 5, 2023. ③ The term of office of the by-elected members shall be the remaining term of the predecessor. Newly established 2023. 7. 5.
